books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport, now a U.S. Marshal, pursues a thief who robbed a drug cartel and killed a child in Biloxi, Miss.
books.name: GOLDEN PREY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The detective Amos Decker (“Memory Man”) witnesses a murder-suicide that turns out to be a matter of national security.
books.name: THE FIX

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: After a raid on a brothel that serviced Chicago’s elite, two people are dead and the madam’s black book has disappeared. Who is responsible?
books.name: THE BLACK BOOK

books.author: by Elizabeth Strout
books.description: A novel-in-stories about the lives of the inhabitants of the rural Illinois hometown of Lucy Barton, the protagonist of Strout’s previous novel.
books.name: ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: A woman with the ability to communicate with animals becomes caught in a cat-and-mouse game.
books.name: NO EASY TARGET

books.author: by Kresley Cole
books.description: A legacy of deceit threatens Lila and Sian's already tenuous bond.
books.name: WICKED ABYSS

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Martha Hall Kelly
books.description: A story of three women’s lives during and after World War II.
books.name: LILAC GIRLS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.
books.name: THE LAST MILE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: Its hockey team’s success will revive a dying town, but its star is caught up in a scandal.
books.name: BEARTOWN

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE
